definition: "to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
meat and bread soup (a specialty of Shaanxi cuisine)
lit. meat wedged in steamed bun/"Chinese burger"/sliced meat sandwich popular in north China

sentences.english: But he could only nibble two steamed buns of broomcorn flour at each meal.
sentences.chinese: 可是他每頓飯只能啃兩個高粱面饃。

sentences.english: Multi-layer thin high mountain stone, planted wheat bun to eat.
sentences.chinese: 山高石多土層薄，種上麥子喫不上饃。

sentences.english: Set fire to the production methods and the use of materials and steamed pastries similar to the production.
sentences.chinese: 火燒的製作方法和用料與油酥饃的製作大同小異。

sentences.english: Wheat buns and pancakes are the main staple of northern cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 用小麥做的饃和煎餅是北方菜中的主食。

definition: meat and bread soup (a specialty of Shaanxi cuisine)
zha jiang mian: ground pork simmered with salty fermented soybean paste (or other sauce) over thick wheat noodles
a kind of a flat bread
to stuff one's face/to eat greedily
strong-smelling vegetable (garlic etc)/non-vegetarian food (meat, fish etc)/vulgar/obscene
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
